name: Golden Dungeons
description:
Golden Dungeons - is a simple hardcore platformer game, the goal to get out of the cave.

The game may seem simple, but some levels so hard, and you need a lot of free time to pass it's.
It will bring a challenge to your skill, reaction, and adaptability. Sometimes the levels will not seem to be passable, but we have always way out ...

Features:
  • Simple controls
  • Pleasant music.
  • Over 25+ levels.
  • Secrets and bonus levels.
  • Hardcore gameplay.
  • More than 3 hours of gameplay

Nothing superfluous, enjoy the game!
